The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程著重通訊工程中多種與電磁波相關元件之分析與設計，包括各式通訊高頻組件分析、輻射特性與導波特性研究、以及其他新型微波與毫米波頻段之電路與天線
description.en: This purpose of this course is to design and analysis the key components in communication engineering by using electromagnetics. It includes the network analysis of various wireless communication components, investigations of electromagnetic waves in the bounded and unbounded region, and other novel circuits and antennas in microwave and millimeter-wave frequency.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要進行「永續建築環境」之相關研究議題探討與分析。於瞬息萬變之環境與極富思維空間之建築研究中並不能全然按理論或法則定律判斷，亦須依實務經驗輔以基礎理論架構予以綜合評估與分析評估。探討之內容包括但不限下面之主題：『永續建築環境規劃設計』、『永續建築環境教育』和『永續能源環境規劃設計』等相關議題間之相互依存性或相關性，藉由國內外之相關案例進行深入探討與分析，期待建立個人對現今永續建築環境之瞭解與認識。
description.en: The theme of the course is "Sustainable Architecture". It aims to provide a forum to examine and discuss solution-oriented methods for implementing sustainable development, and to stimulate more ideas and useful insights regarding architecture development within the context of sustainability. In an effort to explore and map the challenges and opportunities of sustainable development, this course aims to address the various aspects of architecture & urban development in accordance with the principles of sustainability. These themes will address issues but not limit to, architectural design, ecological and social sustainability, economic and environmental sustainability, environmentalism.

name.en: Special Topics on low energy building

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹低耗能建築之理論、技術與案例，課程內容包括降低建築物使用維護過程中能源消耗之各種方法，建築手法包括採光、通風、隔熱，機械手法包括太陽能與風力利用等，配合案例解說以瞭解低耗能建築實務之應用。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to introduce theory, technique and case study of low energy building that include energy consumption method in the usage and maintenance for building life-cycle, which includes daylight, ventilation, insulation that is passive method, solar and renewable energy that is active method. Meanwhile the course will discuss some cases to understand the practicing for low energy building.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。視覺檢測的基本原理、視覺系統原理各元件之作用原理、規格、限制等、影像處理技術（包括影像轉換、影像復原、影像強化、影像分割）、非接觸性尺寸量測、模式辨認（自動邊境偵測：表面積、孔數、週長及重心、方向特徵等）、影像壓縮與傳送、電腦的影像傳送、個案研究。
description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。基本熱傳理論、郎肯循環：蒸汽發生設備、渦輪機、冷凝器、泵及風扇、氣輪機及複合循環；核能原理、PWR、BWR、GCR、LMFBR；再生能源：地熱、太陽能、風力、海洋能源；能源之儲存；環境污染之防治。
description.en: Principles of Heat Transfer, Rankine Cycle: Steam Generators, Turbines Condensers, Pumps and Fans, Gas-Turbine and Combined Cycles, Principles of Nuclear Energy, Nuclear Power Plants: PWR, BWR, GCR, LMFBR, Renewable Energy Resources: Geothermal Energy, Solar Energy, Wind Energy, Energy from the Oceans, Energy Storage, Environmental Aspects of Power Generation.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

name.en: An Introduction to Philosophy of Ecology

description.zh: 本課程將介紹分析下列基本思想：生態中心主義（內含深層生態及動物權及自然權、土地倫理、檢樸生活）、人中心主義（內含淺層生態/環境主義及環境正義、本土化及環球化等議題）、生態女性主義、荒野保護主義、生態社會主義，時間輪迴歷史觀, 綠色宗教論述 (如基督教生態思潮、佛經生態思潮、儒家與生態，原住民生態論述，以及後現代生態科學論述（內含混沌、複雜、模糊及量子力學等理論）。
description.en: Our course will critically and analytically introduce the following basic concepts: ecocentrism (covering deep ecology, rights of nature, right of animals, land ethics, and simple lifestyle), anthropocentrism (shallow ecology and environmentalism covering local and global issues ), ecofeminism, preservation of wilderness, ecosocialism, cyclic perspective of history, greening religions (eco-Christianity, eco-Buddhism, Confucianism and Ecology, indigenous ecological discourses, postmodern theories of sciences  (including chaotic theory, fuzzy theory, theory of complexity, and quantum theory).

description.zh: 本課程旨在加強學生閱讀英文報章雜誌的能力與信心，使其運用閱讀技巧，優遊於不同的主題。課程重點如下：(1)提供與時並進的新聞用字，增加學生的語彙能力。(2)分析時事，提高學生的閱讀信心。(3)收聽新聞節目，如ICRT, CNN，增強學生的聽力。
description.en: This course is recommended to students who are interested to develop competence and confidence in reading the newspapers and magazines and applying the reading skills required to all different kinds of topics. The focuses are (1) to introduce key words from up-to-date news which aims at enriching vocabulary power, (2) to analyze the events from news articles to promote confidence in reading, (3) to listen to the live news reports like ICRT, CNN to increase listening ability.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在培養有效率的工業人才。包括生產、分配、消費財貨與勞務的各部門，無論是新進的員工或最高層的經理，如要請求效率，則定須具備本門知識。本課程分四方面：（一）、人事心理，包括工作分析，人事選用程序及方法，人事測驗原理及應用，工作考核，員工訓練，工作評價；（二）、組織社會心理，包括動機理論與管理，態度與士氣的測量，組織理論與人行為，領導行為，員工參與，意見溝通；（三）、工程心理，包括工作環境與工作效率，機械設備與工作設計，意外防止與工業安全；（四）、消費心理，包括消費行為，廣告宣傳。上課方式包含講授，討論個人習作等。
description.en: This course is designed for cultivating the effective industrial workers. Whoever he is, the person should be full of the knowledge of Industrial Psychology if only he is working and if only he wants to be an effective worker, no matter he is a new person or top management, working in industry or in business, for government or for forivate institute, The focuses of this course will be on (1)personal psychology:including job analysis, personel selection program, the principles and appliance of personnel tests, performance appraisal, personnel training training, job evaluation, (2)social psychology of the organization:including the theory and management of motivation, the measurement of attitude and morale, leadership, employee participation, communication; (3)engineering psychology:including work conditions and industrial effectiveness, machine and job design, accident prevention and insustrial safety; (4)consumer psychology:including consum behavior and advertising. In class, lecture,

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

name.en: Analysis of the Historic Persons in Modern China

description.zh: 自國父鼓吹革命，以迄民國肇造，多少英雄豪傑活躍於歷史舞台上。對於這些時代人物的臧否、評價，實有進一步認識和了解的必要，以便在閱讀此段歷史之時，能作出正確而客觀的判斷。是以本課程擬就民國時期中，較具有關鍵且影響力較大的人物作一公正持平的介紹。此外，台灣在日據時期，亦有多位民主鬥士，不畏異族的高壓統治，竭盡所能，鼓吹新思想、倡導民主運動，其精神實在可佩，對於這些人物我們不可不知，自然亦在我們所要講授的範圍之內。
description.en: Since the revolution of Dr. Sun Yat-sen, many people have played important roles in Chinese history. They have had much influences in our country. It is essential for our students to have further knowledge about them, especiallt during the period of Japanese occupation in Taiwan. There were many people who didn't yield to Japanese control and promoted the democratic movement in Taiwan. They loved the land and tried their best to advocate new thought.In the course, we'll make detailed and accurate introductions about them. Fair understanding will make the students have objective comments about historic persons and the history of the period.

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於討論資源開發進行中及開發後所可能對環境造成之衝擊以及如何因應之對策，其中包括空氣、水、噪音及震動等之控制方法。對於開發後之土地復整及二次利用亦在本課程討論之列。
description.en: This class is to discuss the impact of the mining operations to the environment and how these problem can be resolved.  It includes air, water, noise and vibration controls.  It also discuss the mine reclamation and secondary usage of mined land.

description.zh: 從闡述各種汽車共生系統在特定的工業製程，商業智慧型大樓或大學校園區域網路型式等能源有效利用的整合規劃設計，主要課程內容為： 1.汽車共生系統概念 2.熱力循環的技術理論 3.多元化的原動機利用 4.複合循環發電廠 5.都會型汽電共生利用 6.汽電共生的能源管理 7.汽電共生的環境管理 8.各種熱電轉換裝置 9.高級能源轉換科技之汽電共生
description.en: By studying this course, the following terms can be identified, defined, used: 1.The Concept of Cogeneration system 2.Theory of Cogeneration Technology. 3.Combined cycles plant. 4.Heating and cooling integration with power generation. 5.The Design Concept and Demonstrated economic performance of cogen. sys. 6.Social and Environmental management of cogen. sys. 7.Conversion Method and Technology on advanced system.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機械設計原理、機密機械特有設計考慮、機械結構件之靜態、動態、與熱傳分析。機械次系統單元如主軸單元、動力驅動、進給驅動、與控制系統等之設計與分析。機械之精度與效能分析。工具機之實務設計與分析個案研究。
description.en: Principles of machine design. Special design considerations in precision machinery. Static dynamic, and thermal analysis of structural members of machine. Analysis of sub-unit of machine like spindle unit, power drive unit, feed drive unit, and control system, etc. Accuracy and performance evaluation of machine, Case study with special emphasis on machine tool.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 本課程主要概括性介紹分為三部分：第一、奈米基本理論－介觀物理奈米微粒、奈米碳管與奈米線、奈米薄膜的結構特性、奈米塊體材料的性能等；第二、奈米加工與檢測；第三、奈米材料之應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three parts. Part 1: the fundamental of nanostructure materials. The topics include: nanoparticles, carbon nanotube, nanowire, nanostructure coating, bulk materials, etc. Part 2: fabrication of nanomaterials. The topics include: self-assembled, scanning probe microscope. The measurement of nanomaterials include scanning probe microscope, scanning tunneling microscope, Raman spectroscopy, etc. Part 3: the state-of-the art review the application of nanomateria.

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1)Introduction to Mobile Wireless Communications,(2)Wireless Internet and LANs,(3)Mobile Ad Hoc Wireless Networks (MANET),(4)MAC Protocols for MANET,(5)Multiple Routing in MANET,(6)QoS in MANET,(7)Security Protocols for MANET,(8)Energy Management in MANET,(9)Wireless Sensor Networks,(10)Hybrid Wireless Networks(11)	Recent Advances and Research Issues.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 在接洽商務時能以最基本的日文能力應用在名片交換、自我介紹或洽商時基本會話、禮儀及習俗等之應對。第一篇：商務必備 第一章：交換名片與自我介紹 第二章：電話應對實務 第三章：商務會話實務第二篇：模擬洽商 第一章：到日本訪問時的商務會話實務 第二章：在台與日商買主交涉商業實務第三篇：日本文化有趣篇
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental conversation, courtesies and customs by using the Japanese. In addition to understand the origins and significance of these business behaviors, the students will be requested to conduct a simulated practice, such as changing the business card and self-introduction, in the class to have a better realization.

description.zh: 以整合行銷傳播為基礎，分析產品之廣告與推廣組合機會，進而發展全傳播之策略與企劃，意圖培養學生邏輯思考、資料判讀、廣告企劃分析之能力，亦包括各種產業之企劃工作。
description.en: The topics include: Advertising Media, Integrated Marketing Communication , Media planning, Advertising Effectiveness.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

description.zh: 中小企業策略和管理： 中小企業相對於大企業，在資源的取得乃居於弱勢，如何利用中小企業的優點以創造其競爭優勢，乃本課程研究的重點。 本課程之內容： 1.中小企業的定義 2.創業家 3.特許權 4.財務計劃 5.組織計劃和 TQM 6.行銷研究及通路 7.電腦應用 8.人際關係 9.採購和存貨 10.經營策略 11.國內外中小企業個案研討。
description.en: Small Business Strategy and Management: The aim of the course is to students understand how to create competitive advantage and management in small business. The content of the course description: 1.Definition of small business 2.Entrepreneur 3.Franchises 4.Financing 5.Organizational planning and TQM 6.Marketing Research and Marketing channels 7.Computers 8.Human Relations 9.Purchasing and Inventories 10.Stragetic management 11.Cast studies.

description.zh: 本課程針對電腦初學者所設計，課程依照初學者最需要的電腦入門知識和技能，從基本的網路原理及、網路資源教起，讓同學可以充份掌握並利用並利用網路資源。本課程亦教授網頁編輯觀念教您如何規劃網站架構、再加上互動式表單及動態網頁效果的完整說明,讓同學也能製作出具有專業水準的網站。本課程分為「電腦基礎」和「網際網路」等二部份：(1) 電腦基礎篇：介紹最熱門的網路觀念與操作技巧，內容涵括知識性的網路相關知識，包括網路與Internet發展，以及資訊安全等題材；另外還有操作性的課題，包括WWW與網路搜尋、E-mail電子郵件、HTML網頁製作、FTP檔案傳輸與網站發佈等；學會上網找資料、收發電子郵件、使用即時通訊軟體。(2) 網際網路篇：學會製作個人網頁等技巧。製作網頁以FrontPage中文版的各項基本功能為主，內容包括網站的建立、圖文網頁編輯、表格與超連結、導覽列與共用邊框、分割框架與多媒體互動網頁設計，以及網站的發佈與管理等，讓同學可以完整學習利用FrontPage來編製網頁的編輯技巧。
description.en: This course is designed for the students who want to handle the resource of internet. The is course composed of two parts:（1）The concept of internet and the application program（2）Learning how to build up the website by using Microsoft FrontPage.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線理論2.微波網路分析3.阻抗轉換與匹配4.微波諧振器5.功率分配與方向藕合器6.微波濾波器

description.en: 1. It applies the circulate message of prosperity cycle on Crystal Cycle. 2. It explores contents and situations about relating property by Porter's five force analysis, SWOT analysis, and Diamond analysis.3. It manufactures the Project in relating property.4. It practices and criticizes the Project in relating property.

name.en: Special Topics on T-S Fuzzy Model

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹T-S fuzzy model的理論及其原理，首先介紹如何將一非線性系統藉由Fuzzy Modeling的方法，將其轉換成T-S Fuzzy Model，再以一有系統的方法設計控制器，並將穩定條件以LMI形式表示，最後利用所推導出的演算法，針對真實物理系統進行驗證。
description.en: In this course, the theory and principle of T-S fuzzy model are introduced. First, a procedure how to transform a nonlinear system to a T-S fuzzy model is introduced. Secondly, some systematic methods are introduced to design the controllers for the stability of the overall system and the stability condition is formulated by LMIs form. Finally, the design procedure is utilized to demonstrate by a real physical system.

name.en: Applied Technology of Digital Signal Processor

description.zh: 數位信號處理簡介，DSP架構簡介(以德儀的TMS320C系列為基礎)， DSP作伺服馬達及運動控制之應用與實習。
description.en: Introduction of Digital Signal Processing, Architecture of DSP (based on TMS320 family of Texas Instruments ), Laboratory of servo motor and motion control using DSP

Stepping and servo motor controller 7. AD and DA converters8. Assembly and control of optical scale and encoder 9. Setup and control of the machine

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.en: This course provides study of ergonomics und interaction design related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the project will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 本課程主要研討科技管理，內容包括：（1）導論（2）技術資源與能力（3）技術創新（4）技術策略（5）科技規劃（6）績效評估（7）科技發展倫理（8）智慧財產權。
description.en: The course mainly discusses following topics：（1）introduction, （2）technological resource and capability, （3）technological innovation,（4）strategy of technology（5）technology planning, （6）measuring performance, （7）technology development ethics, （8）intellectual property rights.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 以營利模式方法對企業，產業進行分析。研究宏觀經濟與企業生存的關係，以個案或個別產業為例深入研究。將研究結果應用於企業管理與投資。
description.en: Application of profit model's analytical tool to analyze an enterprise in depth. The same method is also applied to analyze an industrial sector. The objectives are to help a business in business decision making in order to improve its profitability.

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation. It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusuoion, and information technology impact on knowledge management.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.
